<wd l="7176" t="5419" r="9418" b="5683"><run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="40">

<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="40">
(</run>
